items.name: Apocalypse Gnarl
craftedMods: Adds 3 to 109 Lightning Damage to Spells

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any channelling skill, protecting you from damage while you channel it.  Cannot support skills used by totems. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods: Infusion lasts 6 seconds after you finish Channelling
Gain Infusion after Channelling a Supported Skill for 0.6 seconds
Infusion grants 10% more Damage of Types matching Supported Skill Gem's tags
While Channelling a Supported Skill, take 8% less Damage from Hits of types matching the Skill Gem's Tags
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: AoE, Spell, Lightning, Channelling, Duration, Physical

socketedItems.secDescrText: Unleash orbs of energy while you channel that repeatedly jump towards the targeted location until their duration expires, dealing damage in small area after each jump. When you stop channelling, all remaining orbs explode, dealing higher damage in a larger area.
explicitMods: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Exploding Orbs deal 75% of Skill Damage for each 0.4 seconds of remaining Duration
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Spends a portion of your mana to grant a buff that takes some of the damage from hits for you until depleted. The buff grants added lightning damage based on the amount of mana spent by this skill. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods:
75% of Damage from Hits is taken from Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to Mana Spent by this Skill's effect
Buff grants Added Lightning Damage equal to 14% of Mana Spent by this Skill's effect
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell will track how much mana you spend on it, granting a buff when the total mana spent reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, mines or skills with a reservation.
explicitMods:
Gain Arcane Surge after Spending a total of 400 Mana on
Upfront Costs and Effects of a Supported Skill

Arcane Surge grants 20% increased Cast Speed
Arcane Surge grants 58% increased Mana Regeneration rate
Supported Skills deal 25% more Spell Damage while you have Arcane Surge

socketedItems.secDescrText: Places a Sigil on the ground, which grants a buff to you and allies in the area around it for a duration. The Sigil gains stages as you spend mana in its area, making the buff more powerful. You can only have one Sigil of Power at a time.
explicitMods: Gains a Stage when you Spend a total of 400 Mana while in Area
Enemies in Area deal 19% less Damage while at maximum Stages
Buff grants 7 to 141 Added Lightning Damage per Stage
